title: Guardian's Trial
description: To prove their worth, the player must undergo a series of challenging trials set by ancient guardians to gain access to a hidden realm.
subquest: Retrieve the first sacred artifact from the depths of the ocean.
Scale the treacherous cliffs to reach the second guardian's lair.
Decode the ancient runes to unlock the entrance to the third trial.
Survive the labyrinth filled with deadly traps and puzzles.
Defeat the powerful guardian in an epic battle of strength.
Solve the final riddle to gain access to the hidden realm.
